thread.title: Deepika Padukone Debuts The Shiniest Pants Of Spring 2017
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone Debuts The Shiniest Pants Of Spring 2017

title: Deepika Padukone Debuts The Shiniest Pants Of Spring 2017
text:
facebook 
Deepika Padukone’s having a legendary run at fashion, currently. For an actress who’d rather spend Valentine’s Day with her stylist than her alleged boyfriend , supreme style is a well-deserved feat. Post her NYFW sartorial knockouts , the actress dished another one of her perfect tens back home, in Mumbai. 
For Shahid Kapoor’s birthday, the actress was seen pulling off seriously metallic pants by 3.1 Philip Lim, featuring an on-trend paper-bag waist. Pairing her show-stopping pants with a basic H&M camisole, the actress carried along a Gucci clutch (possibly a new addition to her rich-girl bag collection) and Louboutin black pumps. Dewy cheeks and highlighted forehead in-place, the actress’ pulled back hair was expectedly brought out to the night. This look ought to be an important one in you reference checklist for best party looks for spring. Also, remember to add this outfit to your celebrity archive of minimum effort with maximum impact.
